content: HDI-P Drop-in anchor High-performance tool-set short drop in anchor (carbon steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Optimized for more reliable fastening at shallow embedment depths Flush anchor, setting tool and Hilti drill bit form a matched-tolerance system to make it easier to create reliable fastenings Applications Fastenings in hollow-core panels, precast slabs and post-tension slabs ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Base materials: Concrete (uncracked) Technical Data | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | No ### ITEMS- 409498 -
